core.scenario_loader¶

Classes

ScenarioLoader([case_study_conf, ...])

ScenarioLoaderSelector()

ScenarioLoaderSimple([case_study_conf, ...])

This loader is used to load pickle files created by the download_tables.py script.

ScenarioLoaderStandard([case_study_conf, ...])

This loader is used to load things from csv files or the database following the format specified in the paras file.

ScenarioLoaderStandardLocal([...])

This loader is used to load things from parquet files following the structure specified in OpenMercury.

Mercury
